remarks: Deduction version of ~ fvmpt .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Feb-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement:
fvmptd.1 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. D |-> B ) ) $.
fvmptd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> B = C ) $.
fvmptd.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. D ) $.
fvmptd.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. V ) $.
fvmptd $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` A ) = C ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d ph x $.
